Gender-neutral clothing options are a go-to, favoring roomy fits and styles that allow for ease of movement. Alex enjoys accessorizing with handmade jewelry and often uses upcycled materials in their outfits.

Alex resides in a shared apartment with roommates who share similar values. The living environment is open and creative, often used for collaborative art projects and community meet-ups. They wake up at varied times, reflective of their fluid lifestyle, typically starting their day around 10 a.m. to recharge with self-care and creative work before engaging in community activities.

Interests:
Alex enjoys painting, digital illustration, poetry, and participating in local discussion groups. They are keen on learning new skills that can lead to future opportunities and are actively seeking to connect with mentors within their creative fields.
